name: Blood of Heroes
storyline: In Blood of Heroes, battles are fought in the arenas of a borderline world where relentless warriors clash to prove worthy of a hero's title. Start your journey to victory in a dark, medieval, and distinctly Nordic realm of fierce PvP battles in one-on-one and group modes.
summary: Blood of Heroes is a fierce PVP melee action multiplayer game set in a dark fantasy world.Pick a hero, and enhance their raw power of steel with furious battle magic. Claim an arena, and make it your personal hall of eternal glory. Fight for your place on the grim battlefields or surreal borderline world, proving yourself over and over, and make your enemies respect you out of fear, and fear you out of respect.
